directions: Heat the olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, add bacon to skillet and brown, reserve the crispy bacon bits and add the shallots and garlic to the pan. Cook 3 to 4 minutes then deglaze the pan with vinegar, turn spinach into pan and wilt down a bit but do not fully cook the spinach, just give it a few turns with tongs. Season the greens with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Place spinach on a serving dish and top with quartered eggs, shavings of cheese and reserved bacon bits.
ingredients: 4 slices thick-cut bacon or 4 slices pancetta, chopped
2 pounds triple washed spinach, stems removed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Warm Spinach Salad
